caseTitle: The Province of Sindh through Chief Secretary & others v. Ghulam Shabbir
tagline: Discussion on (1) Rule 6-A, 7, 7A & 8A of APT Rules 1974. (2) Acting charge and promotion on regular basis. (3) Consideration for regularization of acting charge appointment or promotion. (4) Acting charge cannot be continued for an unlimited period of time.
